Package it.matjaz.numerus

This package contains the core classes and method of Numerus that allow conversion and manipulation of roman numerals.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RomanCharMapFactory
    Factory generating structures of pairs (roman character, its integer value) to be used in RomanConverter.
    RomanConverter
    Offers conversion methods from roman numerals as Strings to arabic numerals as Integers and vice-versa.
    RomanInteger
    Container for a RomanNumeral and its Integer value tied toghether.
    RomanNumeral
    A container for syntactically correct roman numerals saved as strings.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalArabicValueException
    Checked exception thrown to indicate that the arabic Integer values to to be converted into roman numerals is out of range of possible roman numbers' values.
    IllegalNumeralSyntaxException
    Checked exception thrown to indicate that the string parsed by RomanNumeral does not contain a syntactically correct roman numeral.
    RomanException
    Indicates a generic exception happening withing the Numerus classes.

Package it.matjaz.numerus Description

This package contains the core classes and method of Numerus that allow conversion and manipulation of roman numerals.

The classes have the word Roman in their names to be easilly recognizable.

  • RomanNumeral is the representation of a syntactically correct roman numeral. It's a container of the string with the roman numeral, such as "XLII", but it rejects numerals with wrong syntax. It does not hold any other information, such as the value of the roman numeral. Its only function is to ensure the correct syntax of a roman numeral.
  • RomanInteger holds a RomanNumeral and its Integer value tied toghether, continuously updating one when the other gets changed (in both directions). The internal conversions are performed by a RomanConverter, which is based on a reference of roman characters generated by RomanCharMapFactory. Probably this is one of the most useful classes, since it takes care of the conversions.
  • RomanConverter is an object capable of bidirectional conversions roman numeral to/from Integer with two separate methods. If you need just a simple converter, this is it.
  • RomanCharMapFactory generates a reference for RomanConverter to be able to convert the single roman characters in the numeral.
